thread.section_title: Flologic Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Flologic | flologic.com
thread.title: Phillip Perley

author: Phillip Perley
title: Phillip Perley
text:
I talked to Flow Logic on two occasions about one of their units, but never bought one. My situation is not like a city dweller. Like many people in a rural area my water meter is 1/2 mile from the house. If there is a break in the supply line I need a unit that can be placed at the watermeter.
I didn't feel like developing a solar power source to adpt their unit to my situation and therefore didn't buy one.
